page.title: 05Surbiton and the Railway
page.content:
When the first railway line was beening planned,it was meant to pass through Kingston.The first railway was opened on May 21 1938.The first station was called "Kingston Station"and it was opened in 1840. Surbiton was a good place to live in,it had wide pleasant streets,shaded with luxurious trees.It also had well stocked shops,stately place of worship and good education facilities. It also allowed rich people to travel by train to Surbiton,and out of Surbiton which was easy.
{BY JULIE WAN {JOANNE SANDERSON { ANNA STEVENSON.
